Great work man. Can you please do the Justified season 3 as well? thanks in advance.

Seriously, if movies can have this kind of quality at this size, why do we bother with the 700MB norm. No one uses blank CD's anymore.
There should be 2 types of rips; the 200-400 MB and the 1-3 GB for the people serious about their HD.

Great rip and great movie, thanks a lot.
ucks was looking forward to seein how good was the quality with a file this size..
